name: Baby Cot
description: Client (M/57) is currently unemployed and has chronic medical conditions. He lives in a 2 room rental flat with a family of 5. The family is facing financial hardship and is struggling to afford functional appliances. name: Mattress
description: The family comprises a single father and his two daughters who are in need of mattresses. The father undertakes various odd jobs to support the family; however, due to ongoing medical conditions and persistent leg pain, his ability to maintain consistent employment and income is limited. At present, the family sleeps on the floor, which has resulted in body aches and discomfort. As such, they would like to request for three mattresses, one for each family member.

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Admiralty
contact.name: Shanell Tan

name: Dining Table
description: Family consists of a single mother and her 6 year old son, and they have just moved into a 1-room rental flat. They need a small dining table with chairs to sit on during meals, and prefers a extendable dining table. Please Whatsapp me at 62319407 if you have a suitable one to donate, thank you!
